title: The owner shall establish effective sewage disposal and recycling system during the construction and operational phase of the development
clause_text: The owner shall establish effective sewage disposal and recycling system during the construction and operational phase of the development. No amount of sewage shall go into the natural stream; failing which the resort shall be closed down within 48 hours.
